question: Which is the only Indian company to feature in the Fortune’s ‘Top-20 Big Companies to Work For’ list in 2020?
explanation:
Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) has been selected as one of the Fortune’s Best Big Companies to Work For in the year 2020. It is also the only Indian firm to feature in the Top 20 list.
Great Place to Work, an international workplace-culture expert conducted the survey from 33,000 employees at the certified organisations across the US.
